Class RecoveryATCoordinator

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reapable
    public class RecoveryATCoordinator
extends com.arjuna.mwlabs.wscf.model.twophase.arjunacore.ATCoordinator
    This class is a plug-in module for the recovery manager. It is responsible for recovering failed WSAT ACCoordinator transactions.
